name: Ball Destroyer (Pranshu Gupta)
description:
I am gonna expand this game but i have no more money left.  : )  This game is a casual game but its hard to complete in given time.There will be a timer in which you have to destroy all ball.The time to complete this game is 1 minute. I would recommend you to donate some money. You can pay a little amount to help me please. I hope you will understand my feelings. : )

This game art is all done by my one  friend. Big thank to her
